content: विदारणः {@--1@} A tree or rock in the middle of a stream (to which a boat is fastened). {@--2@} War, battle. {@--3@} The Karṇikāra tree. --णा War, battle. --णं {@--1@} Rending, splitting, tearing, ripping up, breaking, (often with the force of an adj. at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); श्रुतं सखे श्रवणविदारणं वचः <ls>Mu. 5. 6</ls>; युवजनहृदयविदारणमनसिजनखरुचिक्रिंशुक्रजाले <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>, <ls>Ki. 14. 54.</ls> {@--2@} Afflicting, tormenting. {@--3@} Killing, slaughter.
